moves.title: Attributes
changes: Hurtbox updated to better match model

moves.title: Attributes
changes: Hurtbox updated to better match model

moves.title: Neutral Special (Giant Punch)
changes: Fixed fist hitbox not increasing in strength after charges
Comment: While full punch had the proper power, the flag that increased the fist hitbox’s power with each wind was accidentally removed in v3.0’s development, and has now been restored.

moves.title: Back Air
changes: Initial autocancel window 9 > 3

Comment: This change was unintentional, and has been mostly reverted; however, an extra frame has been added compared to previously, as its previous 2 frame window was below the average for back airs.

moves.title: Down Special (PSI Magnet)
changes: Initial hit outer hitbox angle 80 > 512 added to aerial version as well
Comment: Originally, this was kept the same as previously to preserve the feel of mag spike, but we have added the new angle to it after feedback from players.

moves.title: Down Special (Disable)
changes: Reverse hit frames 3 > 1

Comment: As articles work differently with reverse hits than normal hitboxes do, an exact match to Disable’s previous reverse hit window is difficult to achieve. Lowering its ability to reverse hit to only the first frame should match its previous behavior much more closely.

moves.title: Bug Fixes
changes: Fixed issue where Confusion’s reflector hitbox was a smaller size than intended

moves.title: Down Special (Bomb)
changes: Implemented Melee mechanic where Down Special comes out faster while in true crouch and while in grounded ball form

moves.title: Bug Fixes
changes: Fixed animation on Samus uthrow
Fixed Samus’ model scale being larger than intended
Comment: This change was tested and reverted in development for 3.1, but accidentally snuck into a release build.

changes.title: (R-alt) Radiant Stadium PS2
